main event: On November 13, 1957, an unidentified flying object was reported hovering over the vicinity of College Park, Maryland, and observed by multiple witnesses.
interesting points: The object was described as metallic and about 8 feet by 6 feet in size, hovering at an altitude of 5 feet., Witnesses reported hearing a popping sound before observing the object., The object appeared to disintegrate during its descent and shrank to the size of a cigarette paper before disappearing., A total of three separate accounts reported sightings of objects during this timeframe., Investigation revealed that there was no evidence left at the scene and no check was made on the operational details.
sighted object: a metallic object hovering in the sky
witness description: civilian security police and other witnesses in the area
